results.content:
I am oracle certified java programmer and obtaining a certification in ADF is kind of optional, just to get the reference for one my clients.
This course lucks of structured passing, sure showing how project is made kind of important , but it is more important to understand what kind of design patter were take and what really important for certification i mean sure this is light introduction into ADF, but i hoped more for concepts and only coding this is not answer for all of my questions, there not literature advise and no questions after each of the coding session. Did i learn something i think i guess, would i recommend this course definitely no. More concepts and more explanation would be better for this course, the speaker is not native english one, sometimes it was hard to understand, i say do provide better translations subs.

results.content: This course is absolutely knowledge full for beginners but i have doubt about its focus on certification.
